error.DONT_WORK_IN_SERVER: You can NOT modify the server configuration!
error.WHITE_LIST_CONTAIN_ILLEGAL_CHARACT: Illegal characters exist in the whitelist, only letters or commas are allowed
error.BLACK_LIST_CONTAIN_ILLEGAL_CHARACT: Illegal characters exist in the blacklist, only letters or commas are allowed
easyhopper.title: Easy Hopper
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.easyhoppe: Speed up hoppers, or enable classification without using new block
easyhopper.HOPPER_TRANSFER_COOLDOWN.tool: Controls the cooldown for item transfer by the hopper
easyhopper.HOPPER_INPUT_COUNT.tooltip: Controls the number of items transferred by the hopper at one time
easyhopper.HOPPER_OUTPUT_COUNT.tooltip: Controls the number of items outputted by the hopper at one time
easyhopper.HOPPER_CLASSIFICATION.tooltip: If enabled, the last slot of the hopper will act as a classification slot, and only the same type as the classification slot can transfer
easyhopper.HOPPER_BETTER_EXTRACT.tooltip:
1. If a container or full-cube block on the hopper, it will stop searching for entities
2. Reduce the number of chest updates caused by hoppers
easyhopper.HOPPER_EXTRACT_COOLDOWN.toolt: Limit the frequency of hopper searching for entities
easyhopper.HOPPER_MINECART_TRANSFER_COOL: Controls the cooldown for item transfer by the minecart with hopper
easyhopper.HOPPER_MINECART_CLASSIFICATIO: If enabled, the last slot of the minecart with hopper will act as a classification slot, and only the same type as the classification slot can transfer
easyhopper.HOPPER_MINECART_BETTER_EXTRAC: Limit the frequency of minecart with hopper searching for items
easydropper.title: Easy Dropper
easydropper.DROPPER_AUTO_DISPENSE.toolti: If enabled, the dropper will automatically dispense items when it has items inside
easydropper.DISPENSER_AUTO_DISPENSE.tool: If enabled, the dispenser will automatically dispense items when it has items inside
easydropper.BETTER_ITEM_POSITION.tooltip: If enabled, the items dispensed by the dropper will not be offset to the left or right, you can control the landing position
easydropper.DROPPER_COOLDOWN.tooltip: Cooldown for droppers to automatically dispense items
easydropper.DISPENSER_COOLDOWN.tooltip: Cooldown for dispensers to automatically dispense items
easydropper.DISPENSE_SPEED.tooltip: The speed of the items dispensed by droppers; directly affects the trajectory height; if negative, the items will be dispensed downwards
easydropper.DISPENSE_DISTANCE.tooltip: The distance the items are dispensed by the dropper; works in conjunction with the "Dispense Speed"; if negative, the items will be dispensed in front of the dropper
